# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
